column3: @mmachicao Nice first-time contribution! Can you measure the coverage before and after your patch?

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15788](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15788.html) (test: Unify testing setups for fuzz, bench,
Thanks for adding tests!\n\nDrahtBot's coverage statistics show a *decrease* in coverage? I don't see how this is possible @MarcoFalke
Feel free to take over this branch where I've cleaned up the changes to header ordering: https://github.com/laanwj/bitcoin/tree/2019_01_24_upd15104
third-party libraries are separated by a new line (like it was before), so please don't change that.
Yes, please keep the order of includes the same and only add new ones where necessary.
